Entries.default: "Watcher! I suspected you'd be trouble the day I heard your name."
"You've thrown away so much. You could not buy the influence you might have held over the Songretta. "If only you possessed more loyalty."
"A talented but fickle-hearted man, as eager to slip a dagger in your back as shake your hand."
Entries.female: "A talented but fickle-hearted woman, as eager to slip a dagger in your back as shake your hand."

Entries.default: "But for some meaningless Dyrwoodan lord to sail into the region and turn everything on its ear..."
Entries.female: "But for some meaningless Dyrwoodan noblewoman to sail into the region and turn everything on its ear..."

Entries.default: "Sweeping in like something out of the theater... If only I had found you first. We might have done such great things together."
[Attack] "I'm tired of listening to you prattle."
"Castol carried your candle right up until the end. And here the poor fool used to be such a fine judge of character."
"Useful, to a point. But ultimately a disappointment."
"Not much challenge in fighting an old man."
"We can still avoid more bloodshed, Nirro!"
"Ac, even now. But I will put a blade through your heart, Watcher, and sleep all the better for it!"

"You have always known where my loyalties are, Watcher. It is a shame it had to come to this."

Her voice is calm, but you can see her jaw flexing as she sizes you up.
"We should have cut you loose long ago."
"Well. I should have trusted my instincts."
"No matter. I have little time to waste on regrets."
